                         java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String subTitle,
                         int fadeIn,
                         int stay,
                         int fadeOut)

        Sets the title of the given player for the amount of stay ticks. Optionally shows a subTitle and displays a fadeIn and fadeOut effect in ticks.

        See Also:
        title, stay, subTitle, fadeIn, fadeOut
